    ```tsx
    export async function getUsersByIdsInBatches(ids: string[]) {
      if (ids.length === 0) return [];
    
      const chunks = [];

      }
    
      const results = await Promise.all(

            .where('id', 'in', chunk)
            .get();
    ```

```jsx
        ).toString('base64'),
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        oidcToken: {
          serviceAccountEmail: this.configService.get(
            'WEBHOOK_DISPATCHER_SERVICE_ACCOUNT',
          )!,
        },
      },
    };

    return this.tasks.createTask({
      parent: parent,
      task: task,
    });
```
